definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
thriving and prosperous business or trade
to have no interest in sth

sentences.english: I'm fine, just a little down.
sentences.chinese: 我很好，只是有些意興闌珊。

sentences.english: BEFORE the advent of male vanity, the local barbershop used to be a regaling hotspot.
sentences.chinese: 由於男性的虛榮心，當地的理髮館一直以來生意興隆。

sentences.english: I wish you a succes in your business transaction .
sentences.chinese: 新的一週開開始，大家生意興隆。

sentences.english: PROSPER】His business prospered at its new location.
On the other hand, the incense to operate MiPu exclusively.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，金香對經營米鋪意興闌珊。

sentences.english: Fake-brand Jeans are a big business in many places.
sentences.chinese: 冒牌牛仔服在許多地方都生意興隆。

sentences.english: In a quiet afternoon, the hotness made all people looked wan.
sentences.chinese: 一個寂靜的下午，天氣熱的讓所有的人都意興闌珊。

sentences.english: Dongjing Li portability majority of staff wish you good health, business is booming.
sentences.chinese: 董經理攜廣大員工祝大家身體健康，生意興隆。

sentences.english: In business in Xinglong, don't feel ushered in the new year's Eve once a year.
sentences.chinese: 在生意興隆中，不覺又迎來了一年一度的除夕夜。

sentences.english: Since then, that liquor shop always had a booming business.
sentences.chinese: 此後，酒店就以“仙茅酒”作爲此酒名稱，生意興隆。

sentences.english: Last year, he started up a successful fashion house.
sentences.chinese: 去年，他開了一家生意興隆的時裝店。

sentences.english: The hotels are doing a land-office business.
He looked more than ever like a prosperous bagman.
sentences.chinese: 他比以往任何時候都更象一個生意興隆的商販了。

sentences.english: Be affirmative with unerring intuition for his booming business tactics.
sentences.chinese: 慧眼識人，知人善任，經營有道，生意興隆。

sentences.english: The wine sign overhangs the prosperous restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 這座酒樓酒望高掛，生意興隆。

sentences.english: It was a hot day. Drive-ins were doing a land-office business in ice cream and cold drinks.
sentences.chinese: 那天很熱，“免下車”餐館的冰淇淋和冷飲生意興隆。
